Midland.Premier High School of Midland:
Premier High School of Midland is a charter school in Midland, Texas that serves students in sixth grade through twelfth grade. It is part of Responsive Education Solutions of Texas.


== History ==
Premier High School of Midland opened in 1999 as Eagle Charter School with 50 students and three staff and, in 2000, had an enrollment of 150 students.
